Root.name: First Party
Root.description: A first party is the entity, such as a website or company, that directly collects and uses personal/vehicle data from individuals/customers. The company/website/application/service's actual name would be often used as indication of existance of the first party

Root.name: Third Party
Root.description: A third party is the entity (company/organisation) other than the first party company/organisation, that directly/indirectly collects and use personal/vehicle data from individuals/customers

Root.name: Unspecified
Root.description: It is not specified or unclear who collects the data.
